item.title: Harikatha
item.description: Harikatha About Karnataka’s Haridaasa’s cult arouses varied questions in one’s mind. The literary works of great saint poets of Karnataka answer questions relating to spiritual experiences, knowledge of Tantra, Vedic wisdom, Societal Culture, Music, Dance, theatre and the like. But, the prime purpose of Haridaasa literature is to expand one’s life and/or spirit. Hundreds of thousands such unanswered questions pertaining to creation, sustenance, and destruction are answered using simple words of Haridaasas.
